author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 1.34 lakh complaints were received across the State, including charges of defacing and damaging public property, illegal display of banners and of them, action have been taken on over 75,000 of them, an official release stated.

As for similar charges with private properties, over 20,000 cases have been received. As on March 16, a total of 384 and 187 cases have been registered with respect to public and private properties respectively, the release added.
title: EC receives 1.34 lakh complaints
